name: HELIBIZ PTY LIMITED
about: Helibiz Pty Limited is a renowned helicopter flight training school with two convenient locations in Airlie Beach and Mackay, Australia. Founded by Des Davey, who serves as the Company Chief Pilot and Chief Flying Instructor, Helibiz specializes in providing comprehensive helicopter training programs. We offer Private Pilot Licence (PPLH) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPLH) courses, as well as endorsements and ratings renewals. Our experienced instructors and modern fleet ensure a safe and effective learning environment. Whether you are pursuing a career in aviation or flying for personal enjoyment, Helibiz is committed to delivering high-quality training and exceptional service. Join us to embark on your helicopter flying journey with confidence and professionalism.
